titles.title: To designate the 10-year period beginning January 1, 1994, as the National Decade of Historic Preservation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 7/15/1993--Introduced. Designates the ten-year period beginning January 1, 1994, as National Decade of Historic Preservation.
